PerformanceScriptTimingSourceCharPositio.summary: The sourceCharPosition read-only property of the interface returns a number representing the script character position of the script feature that contributed to the long animation frame (LoAF).

remarks.para: It is important to note that the reported function location will be the "entry point" of the script, that is, the top level of the stack, not any specific slow sub-function. See for more discussion around this.

PerformanceScriptTimingSourceCharPositio.value: A number. Returns -1 if the script character position was not found.
